CatDescriptText: Mrs. Sarah Everett, 1314 N. Franklin Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 19, 1958, pg. 9 with question: "Do you think that a business recession has hit the United States? If so, how has it affected you?" answer reads: "I would say that times are hard, and there will be a depression if conditions remain the same.  It has affected me in a lot of ways."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mrs. Sarah Everett wearing dark sleeveless blouse with bow at neckline and eyeglasses, holding sweater, magazine, handbag, and cigarette, standing in front of store window displaying eyeglass frames
